title: Collaborative Assignments
description: Work together with your peers on assignments in real-time, enhancing learning and teamwork skills.

title: Effortless Submission
description: Submit assignments seamlessly through our user-friendly interface, saving you time and effort.

title: Grading Made Simple
description: Easily evaluate and grade assignments, providing constructive feedback to your peers.

title: Assignment Difficulty Levels
description: Set assignment difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard) to challenge students at the right level of complexity.

title: Deadline Management
description: Stay organized with clear due dates for assignments, ensuring timely submissions and assessments.

title: Interactive Feedback
description: Provide detailed feedback on assignments, promoting a culture of continuous improvement and learning.
